component.name: document
component.description: Documents are generated by facelets documents using tags in the http://jboss.com/products/seam/pdf namespace. Documents should always have the document tag at the root of the document. The document tag prepares Seam to generate a document into the DocumentStore and renders an HTML redirect to that stored content.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of the document to be produced. Valid values are PDF, RTF and HTML modes. Seam defaults to PDF generation, and many of the features only work correctly when generating PDF documents.

attribute.name: pageSize
attribute.description: The size of the page to be generate. The most commonly used values would be LETTER and A4. A full list of supported pages sizes can be found in com.lowagie.text.PageSize class. Alternatively, pageSize can provide the width and height of the page directly. The value "612 792", for example, is equivalent to the LETTER page size.

attribute.name: orientation
attribute.description: The orientation of the page. Valid values are portrait and landscape. In landscape mode, the height and width page size values are reversed.

attribute.name: margins
attribute.description: The left, right, top and bottom margin values.

attribute.name: marginMirroring
attribute.description: Indicates that margin settings should be reversed an alternating pages.

component.name: paragraph
component.description: Most uses of text should be sectioned into paragraphs so that text fragments can be flowed, formatted and styled in logical groups.

attribute.name: spacingBefore
attribute.description: The blank space to be inserted before the element.

attribute.name: spacingAfter
attribute.description: The blank space to be inserted after the element.

component.name: text
component.description: The text tag allows text fragments to be produced from application data using normal JSF converter mechanisms. It is very similar to the outputText tag used when rendering HTML documents.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: The value to be displayed. This will typically be a value binding expression.

component.name: font
component.description: The font tag defines the default font to be used for all text inside of it.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The font name, for example: COURIER, HELVETICA, TIMES-ROMAN, SYMBOL or ZAPFDINGBATS.

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: The point size of the font.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: The font styles. Any combination of : NORMAL, BOLD, ITALIC, OBLIQUE, UNDERLINE, LINE-THROUGH

attribute.name: encoding
attribute.description: The character set encoding.

component.name: image
component.description: p:image inserts an image into the document. Images can be be loaded from the classpath or from the web application context using the value attribute. Resources can also be dynamically generated by application code. The imageData attribute can specify a value binding expression whose value is a java.awt.Image object.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: A resource name or a method expression binding to an application-generated image.

attribute.name: rotation
attribute.description: The rotation of the image in degrees.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: The height of the image.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: The width of the image.

attribute.name: alignment
attribute.description: The alignment of the image. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall. The vertical alignment values are top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: alt
attribute.description: Alternative text representation for the image.

attribute.name: spacingBefore
attribute.description: The blank space to be inserted before the element.

attribute.name: spacingAfter
attribute.description: The blank space to be inserted after the element.

attribute.name: scalePercent
attribute.description: The scaling factor (as a percentage) to use for the image. This can be expressed as a single percentage value or as two percentage values representing separate x and y scaling percentages.

component.name: anchor
component.description: p:anchor defines clickable links from a document.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of an in-document anchor destination.

attribute.name: reference
attribute.description: The destination the link refers to. Links to other points in the document should begin with a "#". For example, "#link1" to refer to an anchor postion with a name of link1. Links may also be a full URL to point to a resource outside of the document.

component.name: header
component.description: The p:header and p:footer components provide the ability to place header and footer text on each page of a generated document, with the exception of the first page. Header and footer declarations should appear near the top of a document.

attribute.name: alignment
attribute.description: The alignment of the image. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall. The vertical alignment values are top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: backgroundColor
attribute.description: The background color of the header/footer box. Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColor
attribute.description: The border color of the header/footer box. Individual border sides can be set using borderColorLeft, borderColorRight, borderColorTop and borderColorBottom. Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorLeft
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorRight
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorTop
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorBottom
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderWidth
attribute.description: The width of the border. Inidvidual border sides can be specified using borderWidthLeft, borderWidthRight, borderWidthTop and borderWidthBottom.

component.name: footer
component.description: The p:header and p:footer components provide the ability to place header and footer text on each page of a generated document, with the exception of the first page. Header and footer declarations should appear near the top of a document.

attribute.name: alignment
attribute.description: The alignment of the image. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall. The vertical alignment values are top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: backgroundColor
attribute.description: The background color of the header/footer box. Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColor
attribute.description: The border color of the header/footer box. Individual border sides can be set using borderColorLeft, borderColorRight, borderColorTop and borderColorBottom. Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorLeft
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorRight
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorTop
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderColorBottom
attribute.description: Currently, only named colors are supported. They are: white, gray, lightgray, darkgray, black, red, pink, yellow, green, magenta, cyan and blue.

attribute.name: borderWidth
attribute.description: The width of the border. Inidvidual border sides can be specified using borderWidthLeft, borderWidthRight, borderWidthTop and borderWidthBottom.

component.name: pageNumber
component.description: The current page number can be placed inside of a header or footer using the p:pageNumber tag. The page number tag can only be used in the context of a header or footer and can only be used once.

component.name: chapter
component.description: If the generated document follows a book/article structure, the p:chapter and p:section tags can be used to provide the necessary structure. Sections can only be used inside of chapters, but they may be nested arbitrarily deep. Most PDF viewers provide easy navigation between chapters and sections in a document.

attribute.name: alignment
attribute.description: The alignment of the chapter/section box section. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall. The vertical alignment values are top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: number
attribute.description: The chapter number. Every chapter should be assigned a chapter number.

attribute.name: numberDepth
attribute.description: The depth of numbering for section. All sections are numbered relative to their surrounding chapter/sections. The fourth section of of the first section of chapter three would be section 3.1.4, if displayed at the default number depth of three. To omit the chapter number, a number depth of 2 should be used. In that case, the section number would be displayed as 1.4.

component.name: section
component.description: If the generated document follows a book/article structure, the p:chapter and p:section tags can be used to provide the necessary structure. Sections can only be used inside of chapters, but they may be nested arbitrarily deep. Most PDF viewers provide easy navigation between chapters and sections in a document.

attribute.name: alignment
attribute.description: The alignment of the chapter/section box section. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall. The vertical alignment values are top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: number
attribute.description: The chapter number. Every chapter should be assigned a chapter number.

attribute.name: numberDepth
attribute.description: The depth of numbering for section. All sections are numbered relative to their surrounding chapter/sections. The fourth section of of the first section of chapter three would be section 3.1.4, if displayed at the default number depth of three. To omit the chapter number, a number depth of 2 should be used. In that case, the section number would be displayed as 1.4.

component.name: title
component.description: Any chapter or section can contain a p:title. The title will be displayed next to the chapter/section number. The body of the title may contain raw text or may be a p:paragraph.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The ordering/bulleting style of list. One of: NUMBERED, LETTERED, GREEK, ROMAN, ZAPFDINGBATS, ZAPFDINGBATS_NUMBER. If no style is given, the list items are bulleted.

attribute.name: listSymbol
attribute.description: For bulleted lists, specifies the bullet symbol.

attribute.name: indent
attribute.description: The indentation level of the list.

attribute.name: lowerCase
attribute.description: For list styles using letters, indicates whether the letters should be lower case.

attribute.name: charNumber
attribute.description: For ZAPFDINGBATS, indicates the character code of the bullet character.

attribute.name: numberType
attribute.description: For ZAPFDINGBATS_NUMBER, indicates the numbering style.

attribute.name: alignment
attribute.description: The alignment of the list item. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall. The vertical alignment values are top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: indentationLeft
attribute.description: The left indentation amount.

attribute.name: indentationRight
attribute.description: The right indentation amount.

attribute.name: listSymbol
attribute.description: Overrides the default list symbol for this list item.

attribute.name: columns
attribute.description: The number of columns (cells) that make up a table row.

attribute.name: widths
attribute.description: The relative widths of each column. There should be one value for each column. For example: widths="2 1 1" would indicate that there are 3 columns and the first column should be twice the size of the second and third column.

attribute.name: headerRows
attribute.description: The initial number of rows which are considered to be headers or footer rows and should be repeated if the table spans multiple pages.

attribute.name: footerRows
attribute.description: The number of rows that are considered to be footer rows. This value is subtracted from the headerRows value. If document has 2 rows which make up the header and one row that makes up the footer, headerRows should be set to 3 and footerRows should be set to 1

attribute.name: widthPercentage
attribute.description: The percentage of the page width that the table spans.

attribute.name: horizontalAlignment
attribute.description: The horizontal alignment of the table. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall.

attribute.name: spacingBefore
attribute.description: The blank space to be inserted before the element.

attribute.name: spacingAfter
attribute.description: The blank space to be inserted after the element.

attribute.name: colspan
attribute.description: Cells can span more than one column by declaring a colspan greater than 1. Tables do not have the ability to span across multiple rows.

attribute.name: horizontalAlignment
attribute.description: The horizontal alignment of the cell. Seam PDF supports the following horizontal alignment values: left, right, center, justify and justifyall.

attribute.name: verticalAlignment
attribute.description: The vertical alignment of the cell. Seam PDF supports the following vertical alignment values: top, middle, bottom, and baseline.

attribute.name: padding
attribute.description: Padding on a given side can also be specified using paddingLeft, paddingRight, paddingTop and paddingBottom.

attribute.name: borderVisible
attribute.description: Controls whether or not a border is displayed around the entire chart.

attribute.name: borderPaint
attribute.description: The color of the border, if visible.

attribute.name: borderBackgroundPaint
attribute.description: The default background color of the chart.

attribute.name: domainAxisLabel
attribute.description: The text label for the domain axis.

attribute.name: domainAxisPaint
attribute.description: The color of the domain axis label.

attribute.name: domainGridlinesVisible
attribute.description: Controls whether or not gridlines for the domain axis are shown on the chart.

attribute.name: domainGridlinePaint
attribute.description: The color of the domain gridlines, if visible.

attribute.name: domainGridlineStroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of the domain gridleines, if visible.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: The height of the chart.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: The width of the chart.

attribute.name: is3D
attribute.description: A boolean value indicating that the chart should be rendered in 3D instead of 2D.

attribute.name: legend
attribute.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the chart should include a legend.

attribute.name: legendItemPaint
attribute.description: The default color of the text labels in the legend.

attribute.name: legendItemBackgoundPaint
attribute.description: The background color for the legend, if different from the chart background color.

attribute.name: orientation
attribute.description: The orientation of the plot, either vertical (the default) or horizontal.

attribute.name: plotBackgroundPaint
attribute.description: The color of the plot background.

attribute.name: plotBackgroundAlpha
attribute.description: The alpha (transparency) level of the plot background. It should be a number between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).

attribute.name: plotForegroundAlpha
attribute.description: The alpha (transparency) level of the plot. It should be a number between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).

attribute.name: plotOutlinePaint
attribute.description: The color of the range gridlines, if visible.

attribute.name: plotOutlineStroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of the range gridleines, if visible.

attribute.name: rangeAxisLabel
attribute.description: The text label for the range axis.

attribute.name: rangeAxisPaint
attribute.description: The color of the range axis label.

attribute.name: rangeGridlinesVisible
attribute.description: Controls whether or not gridlines for the range axis are shown on the chart.

attribute.name: rangeGridlinePaint
attribute.description: The color of the range gridlines, if visible.

attribute.name: rangeGridlineStroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of the range gridleines, if visible.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The chart title text.

attribute.name: titlePaint
attribute.description: The color of the chart title text.

attribute.name: titleBackgroundPaint
attribute.description: The background color around the chart title.

attribute.name: borderVisible
attribute.description: Controls whether or not a border is displayed around the entire chart.

attribute.name: borderPaint
attribute.description: The color of the border, if visible.

attribute.name: borderBackgroundPaint
attribute.description: The default background color of the chart.

attribute.name: domainAxisLabel
attribute.description: The text label for the domain axis.

attribute.name: domainAxisPaint
attribute.description: The color of the domain axis label.

attribute.name: domainGridlinesVisible
attribute.description: Controls whether or not gridlines for the domain axis are shown on the chart.

attribute.name: domainGridlinePaint
attribute.description: The color of the domain gridlines, if visible.

attribute.name: domainGridlineStroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of the domain gridleines, if visible.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: The height of the chart.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: The width of the chart.

attribute.name: is3D
attribute.description: A boolean value indicating that the chart should be rendered in 3D instead of 2D.

attribute.name: legend
attribute.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the chart should include a legend.

attribute.name: legendItemPaint
attribute.description: The default color of the text labels in the legend.

attribute.name: legendItemBackgoundPaint
attribute.description: The background color for the legend, if different from the chart background color.

attribute.name: orientation
attribute.description: The orientation of the plot, either vertical (the default) or horizontal.

attribute.name: plotBackgroundPaint
attribute.description: The color of the plot background.

attribute.name: plotBackgroundAlpha
attribute.description: The alpha (transparency) level of the plot background. It should be a number between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).

attribute.name: plotOutlinePaint
attribute.description: The color of the range gridlines, if visible.

attribute.name: plotOutlineStroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of the range gridleines, if visible.

attribute.name: rangeAxisLabel
attribute.description: The text label for the range axis.

attribute.name: rangeAxisPaint
attribute.description: The color of the range axis label.

attribute.name: rangeGridlinesVisible
attribute.description: Controls whether or not gridlines for the range axis are shown on the chart.

attribute.name: rangeGridlinePaint
attribute.description: The color of the range gridlines, if visible.

attribute.name: rangeGridlineStroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of the range gridleines, if visible.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The chart title text.

attribute.name: titlePaint
attribute.description: The color of the chart title text.

attribute.name: titleBackgroundPaint
attribute.description: The background color around the chart title.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The chart title text.

attribute.name: legend
attribute.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the chart should include a legend.

attribute.name: is3D
attribute.description: A boolean value indicating that the chart should be rendered in 3D instead of 2D.
